remarks: The value of the value of vector addition in the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lcdvsubval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvsubval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsubval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcdvsubval.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvsubval.s $e |- S = ( -g ` R ) $.
lcdvsubval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvsubval.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvsubval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` C ) $.
lcdvsubval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvsubval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
lcdvsubval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. D ) $.
lcdvsubval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcdvsubval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F .- G ) ` X ) = ( ( F ` X ) S ( G ` X ) ) ) $.
